CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND($Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission,$User.Id = OwnerId, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Effect"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Expired"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Amended"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Fully Signed"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Other party Review"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Other Party Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Language Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "G4 Approval"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "G4 Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "G5 Approval"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Import")))
), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningOfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportOfflineDocument", "Import Offline Document"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportOfflineDocument", "Import Offline Document"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: ImportOfflineDocument_Custom
